long_description: Got trails to run and mountains to climb? Get the women's Stony Sunglasses from Julbo for multipurpose protection for your eyes, and great styling. Spectron 3 polycarbonate lenses with red flash mirroring block 88% of visible light and 100% of UV rays. Polycarbonate lenses are lightweight yet offer excellent shatter resistance. Wrap-around frames with curved temples hold fast to your head no matter how active you are. Julbo Stony Sunglasses come with a protective case.
short_description: Got trails to run and mountains to climb? Get the women's Stony Sunglasses from Julbo for multipurpose protection for your eyes, and great styling.
